students.name: Isabella Rossi

background.education: BSN from University of North Carolina, Chapel Hill

clinical_history.case_experience: Managed post-operative open-heart surgery patients, including those with LVADs, IABPs, and on ECMO.

family_background.family_in_healthcare: No - first in family to pursue medicine.
family_background.motivation: Inspired to become a CRNA after her grandfather underwent a complex open-heart surgery.
family_background.support_system: Supportive parents and a close-knit group of friends from nursing school.

personal_interests: Volunteering at a local animal shelter
students.career_goals: Wants to specialize in cardiac anesthesia at a major academic medical center.

students.name: Kenji Tanaka

clinical_history.case_experience: Extensive experience with high-acuity trauma patients, managing massive transfusions, and complex airway scenarios.

family_background.motivation: A desire to be at the head of the bed, making critical decisions and providing direct patient care during surgery.
family_background.support_system: Lives with his partner; his family is local and very supportive.

students.career_goals: Interested in becoming a flight nurse/CRNA for a critical care transport team.

students.name: Maria Rodriguez

clinical_history.case_experience: Managed complex post-operative surgical patients, including major abdominal, vascular, and burn surgeries.

family_background.motivation: Wants to provide high-quality care to underserved populations and be a role model for her daughter.
family_background.support_system: Single mother to a young daughter; relies on her extended family for support.

students.career_goals: Hopes to work in a community hospital serving a diverse patient population.

students.name: David Chen
students.hospital: UCSF Medical Center, San Francisco, CA

background.education: BSN from University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA)

clinical_history.case_experience: Cared for patients with traumatic brain injuries, strokes, and post-operative neurosurgical procedures.

family_background.motivation: Fascinated by the pharmacology and physiology of anesthesia.
family_background.support_system: Married, no children. His wife is a software engineer.

students.career_goals: Considering a career in academia and research, possibly pursuing a PhD after his DNAP.

students.name: Aisha Adebayo

clinical_history.case_experience: Managed critically ill patients with sepsis, ARDS, and multi-organ failure.

family_background.family_in_healthcare: Yes - her mother is a registered nurse.
family_background.motivation: Inspired by her mother's career and wants to advance her practice to the highest level of nursing.
family_background.support_system: Married with two young children; balances a demanding school schedule with family life.

students.career_goals: Plans to work in a large, urban hospital and eventually become a clinical instructor.

students.name: Omar Al-Jamil

background.education: BSN from The Ohio State University

clinical_history.case_experience: Expert in managing complex cardiac patients, including heart and lung transplants.

family_background.motivation: A passion for the intricate science of cardiac physiology and anesthesia.
family_background.support_system: Single, and is the primary caregiver for his aging parents.

students.career_goals: Aspires to be a leader in cardiac anesthesia, working on a specialized cardiac team.

students.name: Leilani Kalua
students.hospital: Tripler Army Medical Center, Honolulu, HI

background.nursing_experience: 7 years as an active-duty Army nurse in various ICUs

clinical_history.case_experience: Served in Germany and Afghanistan, managing combat casualties and critical care air transports.

family_background.family_in_healthcare: Yes - several aunts and uncles are nurses.
family_background.motivation: Wants to serve fellow soldiers and their families by providing the best possible anesthesia care.
family_background.support_system: Her husband is also an active-duty soldier. They have a strong military community support system.

students.career_goals: Continue her career in the military as a CRNA, with the goal of becoming a chief CRNA.

students.name: Michael Johnson

clinical_history.case_experience: Vast experience with a wide range of surgical and trauma patients in a high-acuity, Level 1 trauma center.

family_background.motivation: Saw the impact a CRNA had on his mother during her cancer surgery and was inspired to pursue the profession.
family_background.support_system: Married; his wife is a lawyer. They are a strong professional couple.

students.career_goals: Wants to work in a large academic center, combining clinical practice with a role in diversity and inclusion initiatives for the hospital.
